entry.p: It seems I forgot to mention that I'm giving an invited talk this Friday at the FutureVision 2010 conference being held on the campus of Colorado State University. Check out the program for details. The talk is not about Jabber or any specific technology, more about technology trends caused by ubiquitous computing and always-on connectivity. But you can be sure that presence, identity, real-time communications, security, and intellectual property will be part of the mix... :-)
